title: [SOLVED]820-2850 crashes when running graphics test
message: I read up a bit on this issue and found that the issue is usually from a failure at C9560. I checked voltage there and get 1.57, should be 1.8v correct? I have replaced the IC with a larger 330 one, but I still get the same 1.57v. Could it be pulled down by a short in the GPU?

title: [SOLVED]820-2850 crashes when running graphics test
message: Look at schematic and see that it can switch between 1.5 and 1.8V. If it still crashes after replacing C9560 then in the trash it should go.

title: [SOLVED]820-2850 crashes when running graphics test
message: Replaced C9560 and running fine now, thanks!
